column4: hey.  my friends windows xp box has been ravaged by many users and is now so bad that he wants to reinstall, and he also wants to install ubuntu next to it.  what's the best strategy for installing both OSes to work together
(every time i install linux next to xp, something gets screwed up.  at the moment im trying to get hal.dll reisntalled on windows)
xp first chronologicially or xp at the beginning of the drive?
